english.segment1: Well, I'm tired of saying everything. I feel like I'm supposed to say. I'm tired of smiling all the time. I wanna throw the mask away. Sometimes you just have a bad day. Sometimes you just wanna scream. Tell me I'm not the only one. Tell me that you feel just like me
english.segment2: We keep tryin to make it look so nice. And we keep hidin' what's goin on inside. But what if I share my brokenness. What if you share how you feel. And what if we weren't afraid of this crazy mess
english.segment3: What if we were real. What if we were real
english.segment4: I'm over hidin my tears. I think I'm gonna let em' go. I'm over actin so strong. When I ain't even in control. We make it so complicated. But why does it have to be. Why can't we open our hearts and let everybody see
english.segment5: We keep tryin to make it look so nice. And we keep hidin' what's goin on inside. But what if I share my brokenness. What if you share how you feel. And what if we weren't afraid of this crazy mess
english.segment7: We'd think a little less of ourselves. We'd care about someone else. 'Cause we'd know just how they feel. Maybe we could let someone love us. Maybe we'd a little more like Jesus. Why can't we learn to real
english.segment8: Na, na, na, na, na, na, na (yeah, yeah). Na, na, na, na, na, na, na
english.segment9: We keep tryin to make it look so nice. And we keep hidin' what's goin on inside. But what if I share my brokenness. What if you share how you feel. And what if we weren't afraid of this crazy mess
english.segment11: You've got to be real. You've got to be real. You've got to be real. You've got to. You've got to
english.segment12: Na, na, na, na, na, na, na. Na, na, na, na, na..
